title: Cape Cod & Cottage Style 3 bed 2 bath & Updated Kitchen with Cabinets
description: Your suburban oasis awaits! Watch the seasons unfold while living in this tucked away, one-of-a-kind Cape Cod/cottage style home (circa 1950) on nature's doorstep, on a private road  in the Roselawn Island Estates section of Lansdowne. There are just a few homes on this no-thru street, where  you'll experience serenity & seclusion, yet you know who your neighbors are. A 5-car,Y-shaped  d/way leads to this place w/an architectural shingle roof. The entire house is surrounded by land (.36 acres). & the neighbors have quite a bit of land as well, so, as you can see, you are really purchasing an affordable dream.! Inside, the walls are all white, so you have a blank canvas on which to paint to your liking. The floors are well-maintained  hardwoods t/o. The windows are casements & replacements. There are 2-paneled door all over as well. Enter your private escape via the large vestibule, complete w/a whole wall of stained shelving & sliding doors to show off your collectibles, The PR is a newer addition, bumped out to the garage ( with carriage style door)in order to have a 1/2 bath on the 1st floor. Here you'll find a new toilet, grey walls, shiny vinyl flooring  &  dual lighting atop the mirrored medicine cabinet & corner vanity sink. To the left is the spacious  living room w/a non functioning brick FP & wooden mantel. (see  the report in the "disclosures" section.) You can get to the Dining Room  w/ceiling fan from the vestibule or Living Room. There's a door to the yard here, similar to the front door. (Lots of room to place a patio, porch or deck here.) Just off the DR is the  updated & upgraded, good-sized, eat-in kitchen. Most of the appliances have never been used. There is a double, louvered  bifold door on the pantry, loads of maple cabinets w/soft-close drawers & cabinets w/stainless steel pulls. stainless sink too! The  tent-style vent for the black & white electric stove matches the cabinetry! The vinyl floor in neutrally designed, the DW is Kenmore. The Formica  counter top is gray. The stairs to the 2nd floor originate in the LR, & lead to 3 BR's & a full ceramic-tiled bath. The room at the top of the steps to the right shows off 2 sets of built-in drawers & cabinets, an alcove & a cedar closet. Br #2 also has an alcove and wide cedar closet. The 3rd BR boasts  an open area w/ 5 shelves, an open closet w/a clothes bar & a cedar closet. There are eaves storage areas here as well. The attic space is well insulated with fiber glass,and there is a louvered door linen closet in the hallway. The bath comes complete w/small gold & white tiles, a new faucet assembly on the light maple vanity sink, w/a 3 paneled, mirrored  medicine cabinet & 4-fight fixture overhead, new neutral vinyl flooring, a replacement window w/deep tiled sill, a new tub surround, & a cabinet over the toilet. GIVE YOUR NUMBER TO MORE DATA.

title: Gorgeous private room & bath in Cedar Park Victorian
description:
We’re friendly, community-minded nerds (ages 42, 41, 7, and 3, plus old doggo). We like music (making and listening), talking about politics & history, comfort-food TV, general ridiculousness. We’re looking for a housemate who is at least comfortable with kids and at most actively excited about hanging out with them.
About the space: it's on the second floor, with big south-facing bay windows and plenty of room (about 20 feet by 20 feet, plus two closets). Wood floors. Can be furnished or not. The adjacent bathroom (big jetted tub for relaxing, plus separate shower) is mostly private to you. The laundry room is down the hall, next to the guest room/office.
The rest of the house: 3 bedrooms on the third floor; first floor is living room, dining room (with nice piano, guitars, ukulele, music books, giant dinner-party-sized table), well-equipped kitchen, mudroom with half bath. Central air conditioning, supplemented with window units on 2nd and 3rd floors. Unfortunately, the house isn’t wheelchair accessible.
Details:
- $850/month covers rent and all the utilities.
- The room will be available starting about July 15, but we’re flexible on move-in.
- We prefer a short-term (4-6 month) lease, but open to long term for the right person.
- We're very vaccinated and you should be too.
- No smoking anywhere around the house, even on the porch, please. Ideally no smoking at all anywhere.
- Street parking usually available, but also very public-transit-accessible. 52 bus around the corner, 34 trolley a five-minute walk, MFL 10 minutes.
- Potentially open to another dog.

title: Spaciously Furnised Walk To Work 1bd 1bth w/ parking space
description:
Another WOW at the I. M. Pei designed Society Hill Towers! The corner one bedroom with a floor to ceiling window in the kitchen, six floor to ceiling windows in the living area, and two additional floor to ceiling windows in the bedroom looking out to the Center City skyline and historic Philadelphia with a view of the bridge as well will make your artwork feel like just a bonus. And to top it off, this home has just been completely renovated. The clean and crisp white galley kitchen has contemporary cabinets, stainless appliances, quartz counters and a stunning dark gray glass tiled backsplash. There are new floors throughout this home as well. The living area easily holds a dining table. The gray and white bathroom has also just been gutted and re-done leading into your bedroom where you can fall asleep looking out on the magical view. Society Hill Towers is a special complex comprised of three towers, with possibly the best private building in ground swimming pool in the city, underground parking  and a fitness room as well. On site is Sue’s Produce market and the James Beard award winning Zahav restaurant. You are steps away from the popular weekend farmers market at Headhouse Square, and also from so many places to eat and lush green parks. The special assessment on this home has been paid. Condo fee includes utilities and monthly internet.
This is a perfect home for commuters. All utilities are included. I’m 55 years old, currently separating from my husband and I’m interested in renting out the unit for a quiet and meticulous tenant, must be neat and no parties. Currently in CA until December and I need someone I can trust with the property. All paperwork will be done virtually.
Mary

title: 3 Bedroom 3 Bathroom Luxury Apartments for Rent University City!!
description:
Located right down the street from Drexel University and the University of Pennsylvania, now available, 4055 POWELTON AVE in University City. This BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION building is the perfect place to call your new home! Entering the unit you will walk up the stairs to the kitchen and living room area. You will quickly notice the “Wood look” tile that covers the floor, large windows, providing an abundance of natural light, and the open concept kitchen and living room area. This beautiful kitchen comes with plenty of cabinet space, stainless steel appliances, gorgeous granite countertops, and an island/ breakfast bar. You do not have to worry if your furniture will fit in the large and spacious living room. This also provides a great spot for entertaining. Behind the kitchen is the one bedroom that is connected to this level. In the bedroom, you will see the natural white oak planks that cover the floors, a large closet, and your personal en-suite bathroom.
Going up to the third floor you will really get the full effect of the natural white oak flooring that covers this whole level. The in unit washer/ dryer closet will be found at the top of the steps in the hallway. Two bedrooms on both ends with their own private bathrooms make up the rest of this level. The bathrooms throughout all the units include very beautiful and popular white and gray tile and modern fixtures and finishes.
One more level up you will be on your own PRIVATE ROOF DECK! This huge private deck area is great for entertaining, barbecuing, or just relaxing and soaking in the views.
Upper Units $2800
Lower units have the same features as the upper units with the exception of private roof deck access and are available at $2400
Schedule your showing with us today!!

description:

Family/responsible adults preferred.
Contact Name: Matt
Please contact directly at:  show contact info

-Additional lease terms apply and will be shared upon further interest.
Listing Detail:
Exclusive high-quality NEW CONSTRUCTION home made by a meticulous builder. Special attention was given to each and every detail in the building of this state of the art project. Located in the Point Breeze section of South Philadelphia, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects. This gorgeous home has 4 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood floors, recessed lighting, low VOC paint throughout the house, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and cable wiring in each room. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious living room. Past the living room you enter into an open eat-in kitchen and dining area. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with granite counter-tops, Breakfast bar with pendant lighting, SS appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), custom backsplash, and under cabinet lighting. Following the kitchen is the entrance to the spacious concrete backyard. To insure your privacy, the backyard has 6ft high concrete and block walls. From the first floor, custom 15-inch wide commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents two amazing sunlit rooms, and a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set. Following the staircase to the 3rd level you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has the master suite with a bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom and a spacious closet and a private balcony! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, custom his & her vanity set, and designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot house where you will find a wet-bar and access to the rooftop deck where you have a stunning 360-degree view of the City. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement has a spacious bedroom, custom full bathroom, utility closet, and laundry room. Extra included bonuses: wireless Ring bell system, 8ft entrance door, Extra Large High Energy Efficient Casement windows, Built-in speakers in living room, organized closet shelving system.
